I'm interested to hear more about @tezos' oracle network. Sounds like $XTZ will be used as incentives?  Bad idea. Why? Same reason #Chainlink isn't using $ETH.   Your oracle network ends up at the mercy of general fuckery on that specific blockchain. It's a security risk.
